title: Anti-Racist Curriculum Design in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of healthcare systems
context.additional_context: Developing the ability to understand anti-racism concepts in digital learning environments and apply them in medical settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the connection between core concepts of anti-racism and healthcare inequalities
Learners can present practical applications of anti-racism education cases through small-group discussions
Learners can write reflective journals to recognize their unconscious biases and establish improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
